recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.method: 1. Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind the soaked ingredients to a smooth batter and ferment overnight. 3. Make a tempering with mustard seeds, green chilies, curry leaves, and onion. 4. Mash the potato and mix it with the tempering. 5. Heat a tawa and pour the batter to make a thin dosa, add the potato filling, and fold. 6. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

recipes.title: Sambar
recipes.method: 1. Cook toor dal and vegetables with turmeric until soft. 2. In a pan, heat oil, and add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and sambar powder. 3. Add the cooked dal and tamarind pulp, simmer for 10 minutes. 4. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or dosa.

recipes.title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
recipes.method: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add curry leaves and onions, sauté until golden. 2. Add ginger garlic paste and sauté. 3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add chicken pieces and cook. 5. Add chettinad masala and salt, cook until chicken is tender. 6. Serve hot with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Thayir Sadam (Curd Rice)
recipes.method: 1. Cook rice and let it cool down. 2. Mix the cooled rice with curd and salt. 3. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chili. 4. Pour the tempering over the curd rice and serve.

recipes.title: Pongal
recipes.method: 1. Roast moong dal and rice together for a few minutes. 2. Pressure cook rice and dal with water for 3-4 whistles. 3. Heat ghee in a pan, add cumin seeds, black pepper, cashews, and curry leaves. 4. Add the cooked rice-dal mixture to the pan and mix well. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Rava Kesari
recipes.method: 1. Heat ghee in a pan, roast cashews and raisins, and remove. 2. Add rava to the pan and roast until golden. 3. Add water and cook until the rava absorbs it. 4. Add sugar, cardamom powder, and ghee. 5. Mix well, garnish with cashews and raisins. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Hyderabadi Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Marinate chicken with biryani masala, ginger garlic paste, yogurt, and salt. 2. Fry onions in oil until golden brown, and add tomatoes and cook. 3. Add marinated chicken, mint leaves, and cook until tender. 4. Layer the rice and chicken, add saffron water, and cook until done. 5. Serve hot with raita.

recipes.title: Dosa Batter
recipes.method: 1. Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind the mixture to a smooth batter. 3. Ferment the batter overnight. 4. Heat a tawa and make dosas with the batter. Serve with chutney and sambar.

recipes.title: Kootu Curry
recipes.method: 1. Cook toor dal and vegetables until soft. 2. In a pan, heat oil and add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and cumin powder. 3. Add the cooked dal and veggies, then coconut paste. 4. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot with rice.

recipes.title: Medu Vada
recipes.method: 1. Soak urad dal for 4 hours and grind to a thick batter. 2. Shape the batter into doughnuts and fry in hot oil until golden brown. 3. Serve hot with coconut chutney.
